summary: Adds a follower that fights for your life with honor and courage!
descriptionHtml:
Aerias Lavaticus is called the Leader of the Legion because of his roman armor and status. He is honor bound to serve at your side and will willingly die for your cause. this man is unstoppable due to his savage fighting style mixed with the control and self regulation of the roman military!

the Leader of the Legion can be found in the entrance of Markarth, he will follow on command and carry the extra weight you cannot.

One bug has been found... the first time you see Aerias Lavaticus he will be armorless.... i cannot find a way to change this... if anyone has any suggestions they would be greatly appreciated....

the first time you meet Aerias Lavaticus ask him to follow you and access his inventory... then take one item from him, this should equip the rest of his equipment and when you give back the item you took it will be equipped as well.
author: Gthwlb
